traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The necromancer is an 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The necromancer has the following wizard spells prepared: * Cantrips (at will): chill touch, acid splash, mage hand, prestidigitation * 1st level (4 slots): ray of sickness, witch bolt, tasha’s hideous laughter * 2nd level (3 slots): ray of enfeeblement, crown of madness * 3rd level (2 slots): animate dead, vampiric touch

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage.
